description: Calling all out-of-bounds powder hounds and weekend ski resort warriors: we've got the jacket for you! The Men's GORE-TEX® Orion Jacket is destined for your next snowy adventure on the mountain. Built from rugged 3-layer GORE-TEX®, this ski jacket will keep you dry and protected from Mother Nature's fiercest, wettest conditions in the deepest powder imaginable. Whether you're clicking or strapping in, this breathable shell is sure to keep you cool when you're bombing off-piece powder or practicing your form on winding catwalks all the way down to the Gondola.
name: Marmot Orion GTX Jacket - Mens
